LanguageData.acat.console.label: Call the Orbital Traders Hub
LanguageData.acat.job.infomessage.success: A trading request was sent to the Orbital Traders Hub. They will not answer any additional requests from you for {0}.
LanguageData.acat.incident.refusal.label: Refusal notice from Orbital Traders Hub
LanguageData.acat.incident.refusal.base: The Orbital Traders Hub has to decline your trading request.
LanguageData.acat.incident.refusal.toomanytraders: This is because there are too many ({0}) tradeships at your location already.
LanguageData.acat.incident.refusal.noorbitaltradersav: This is because they currently have no traders available near your colony.
LanguageData.acat.traderletter.label: Offer from Orbital Traders Hub
LanguageData.acat.traderletter.text:
The Orbital Traders Hub offers to send an orbital trader ship to your location in {0}.

They request an upfront fee of {1} silver to cover their costs for adjusting the ship's route.

The silver will be teleported to the hub immediately - if you accept.
LanguageData.acat.traderletter.error.ok: Wait there are no traders to select ...
LanguageData.acat.traderletter.payed: The fee of {0} Silver was yeeted to the Orbital Traders Hub
LanguageData.acat.costsrange.description: Absolute range of silver the Orbital Traders Hub will request from you to send a ship (Costs have NO IMPACT on the ship's stock!)
LanguageData.acat.considercolonywealth.description: Whether the Traderships cost will be selected from a static, absolute range or dynamically calculated using the colonywealth
LanguageData.acat.costsrange.relative.description: The Orbital Traders Hub ship-costs will scale with your colony's wealth "Colonywealth * value-in-range in %" (Costs have NO IMPACT on the ship's stock!)
LanguageData.acat.delayrange.description: Range of delay a trader ship will have until it finally shows up
LanguageData.acat.cooldownrange.description: Range of cooldown time between the Orbital Traders Hub can be called once again
LanguageData.acat.canselectkind.description: Determines if you can choose between all or only one random type of trader to show up
LanguageData.acat.randomeventallowed.description: Enable the Orbital Traders Hub offer-letter as a random event that might occur without triggering it via commons console
LanguageData.acat.timeoutrange.description: Offers from the Orbital Traders Hub will expire after this range if you don't react to them
LanguageData.acat.timeoutactive.description: If enabled offers from the Orbital Traders Hub will expire after a given timeout period
